
PyModel release history 

Nov 2009  Version epsilon, posted for colleagues but not announced
Jan 2010  Version 0.8  For Northwest Python Day 2010
Mar 2010  Version 0.85 Add observables, improve graphics. See release-0.85.txt
  ? 2010  Version 0.9  Add safety analysis, add synchronous stepper for Socket
  ? 2010  Version 1.0  Support observable actions, asynchronous steppers

Revised March 2010
